short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an extension to change all amazon links to amazon links with the cmdann.ca affiliate info.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extension that automatically applies CMDann.ca's Amazon affiliate code. This allows you to support the site without getting in the way of your regular shopping. We appreciate everybody who uses this.
